name: 50% chance
description:
Lucky-based platformer

You have to complete 6 levels as fast as you can but be careful with the luck platforms. They'll make you fall if you underestimate them.

Your luck and ability to be smarter than the level will choose your ending (even dying 100 times or more can be rewarding)

With the button screenshot (at the end) you can save an screenshot with your record in your game folder. Please try to publish it in Twitter with the hashtag #50ChanceRecord to stand for the game record.
